comments:
NPE when setting the delta time (Syncronize time)

Import two logs from two different hosts in the same monitor then open the Host 
Properties page on one host and change the Delta time, press OK then double 
click on that host in the Profiling Monitor view. The following exception will 
be thrown (check the .metadata/.log file):


java.lang.NullPointerException
